attributes.action: take action on petitions submitted by the public on this site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have yet to see any more substantial action taken by this Government on petitions submitted by members of the public than the issuance of wordy and mendacious public-relations essays written by public-relations apparatchiks in the pay of a public-relations-obsessed Prime Minister.

When a petition has been signed by the requisite number of people, we want action, not excuses, essays or lies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
